SEARCH
Package grafiosch.common

Annotation Interface ImportDataRequired

@Target(FIELD) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Inherited public @interface ImportDataRequired
Marks a field as required during CSV import operations.

When a field is annotated with this annotation, the CSV import process will:

  • Require that the corresponding column exists in the CSV header
  • Require that the value is non-empty for each data row
  • Throw a DataViolationException if the column is missing

This annotation is processed by CSVImportHelper.getHeaderFieldNameMapping(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<?>, grafiosch.entities.User) during the header mapping phase of CSV import.

Example usage: 

 public class MyEntity {
   @ImportDataRequired
   @PropertyAlwaysUpdatable
   private String currency;  // Must be present in CSV

   @PropertyAlwaysUpdatable
   private String isin;      // Optional in CSV
 }
See Also:
  • CSVImportHelper
  • FieldColumnMapping
